domain.name: Entertainment Personality
domain.description: An entertainment personality in the world, like Anderson Cooper or Miranda Sings

text: @DrOz I do understand what you were saying. You were not advocating the sacrifice of our children to open the schools. The action itself will affect the Covid-19 numbers. But the benefits are huge. That’s hard to think about. Thank you for your hard work and compassion.
